long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension allows you to leave anonymous comment for any offer on supported bill board web-sites. Your comment will be visible for everyone who came to particular offer.
How to place your comment:
1. Go to any offer on available platform (list of supported platforms is down below)
2. Open the extension popup
4. Click button Add comment
5. Write your comment, click OK
And your opinion for this offer will be visible for everyone who has the extension.

Currently supported bill boards: 
* olx.pl
* otodom.pl
* nieruchomosci-online.pl
* avito.ru
* trademe.co.nz
